modName: Skyrim Theme - Peter Hollens Cover Remastered
summary: Peter Hollen's cover remastered and edited in  Audacity.
descriptionHtml:
[center][b]Skyrim Theme - Peter Hollens Cover Remastered [/b]


[youtube]u6NNYQGD_qQ[/youtube]

I always did love Peter Hollen's version, but it wasn't quite deep enough for me, didn't have that warriors singing in a mead hall feeling, so i decided to edit it in audacity to give it more presence and umpfh!

The file is packed properly etc, so ll you need to do is either download it through NMM and activate it there, folders are set correctly, so it's a matter of just plug and play.

Alternatively, if you wish to download it manually, just extract the data folder into your main skyrim directoy.

Viola!

Enjoy and turn up those speakers for audio bliss.[/center]
author: Dhegonus

files.name: Skyrim Theme - Peter Hollens Cover Remastered
